message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. This is a great price considering its value to me is at least $800000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $850000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $800000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is at least $800000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $800000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that $800000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer it to you for $785000. This is the best price I can offer, considering its value to me is at least $800000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, $785000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $780000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I'll offer it to you for $782500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its value to me is at least $800000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, $782500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $777500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm not willing to go any lower than this, Bob. I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $780000, but no lower. This is the final offer I can make. What do you think?
